documents.document: I painted "Plugged In William Randolph Hearst" after reading @lucyhale's latest tweets with powerful warrior-woad-blue, media-savvy Netflix-red and influential Madonna-blonde https://t.co/BGpBfoORhA
Twitter is a smoke-filled back room in which William Randolph Hearst can enjoy @lucyhale's media-savvy and powerful tweets while telling politicians what to do https://t.co/G33ixrvooF

I painted "Quick-tempered Steve Martin" after reading @DAVID_LYNCH's latest tweets with entertaining Bollywood-curry-brown, sardonic Joker-purple and quick-tempered firebrand-red https://t.co/KxDfyXwo6b
Russian hackers are watching! @DAVID_LYNCH's powerful and entertaining tweets suggest infection with the MAG1C1ANZ virus https://t.co/lHCxuOba7I
Warning: the entertaining MAG1C1ANZ virus redirects any incoming spam that even vaguely resembles a joke list to all your Facebook 'friends'
This educational new book about computational creativity makes Douglas R. Hofstadter's 'GÃ¶del, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid' seem as educational as a rerun of Jaws III
